answers.answer: I think because of your husband's health conditions, his doctor is just erroring on the cautious side....good for him!  My husband also has Diabetes, and they are very cautious prior to any surgery he has to have.  I don't know how old your husband is, but with age and these health conditions, our health can change quickly.  I would feel good that his doctor is be cautious with this.
